sentences.english: The rookie turned out to be the best hitter on the team.
sentences.chinese: 新手证明是队里最出色的击球员。

sentences.english: Tom has beaned as many as three batters in one game.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆在一局里击中3个击球员的头部。

sentences.english: The first two batsmen were bowled out.
sentences.chinese: 头两名击球员被判出局了。

sentences.english: His pitching was a legend among major league hitters.
sentences.chinese: 他的投球在大联盟的击球员中是个传奇。

sentences.english: The hitter swatted the ball so hard that the bat broke.
sentences.chinese: 这位击球员击球过重把球棒都打断了。

sentences.english: Where do the pitcher and the hitter stand?
sentences.chinese: 投手和击球员站在哪里？

sentences.english: He was out trying to turn a ball to leg.
sentences.chinese: 他想把球回击到击球员左后方场地，结果出局了。

sentences.english: We won by six wickets, ie won with seven of our batsman not out.
sentences.chinese: 我们队以七名击球员未出局而获胜。

sentences.english: The pitcher loaded the bases by walking three batters.
sentences.chinese: 投手将3个击球员送上垒。

sentences.english: Tom skittled the batsmen out in the second innings.
sentences.chinese: 在第二局汤姆让击球员连续出局。

sentences.english: He fired a ball at a batter.
sentences.chinese: 他向击球员猛掷一个球。

sentences.english: How do you feel about the designated hitter rule?
sentences.chinese: 您怎么理解击球员规则？

sentences.english: The batsman slammed the ball into the grand - stand.
sentences.chinese: 击球员把球击入了大看台。

sentences.english: The first batsman was bowled out.
sentences.chinese: 头一个击球员被迫退场了。

definition: to strike out/strikeout (baseball, softball)/(Tw) to ditch/to eliminate from consideration
